content: *100% of the sales collected on march 18 2019 will be donated 1 to help the families of victims of the new zealand mosque shootings* **update ** *with your support we collected $6000 in donations thank you all so so much * knit in la bien aimèe merino super sock these quick and easy ankle socks are perfect for the warmer months they are are knit from the cuff-down beginning with a long-tail tubular cast-on and feature a fun scalloped cuff detail though this pattern only features 2 sizes the stitch counts are based on the stockinette gauge the nature of the ribbed instep stitches allows for lots of versatility between sizes and an adjustment in needle size might also be helpful in decreasing or extending the sizing **sizes** 1 2 to fit foot circumference of 7 5 8 5 in / 19 05 21 59 cm recommended to be worn with 0 5-1 1 27-2 54 cm negative ease **yarn** la bien aimée merino super sock 75% merino 25% nylon 467 yds / 425 m per 100 g approx 200-400 yards/ 182-365 76 meters sample is knit in the dawn colorway shown in size 1 **needles** 2 5 mm / us 1 or needle size to obtain gauge 2 75 mm / us 2 or needle to obtain gauge this pattern is written for double pointed needles but can easily be worked using magic loop **gauge** 36 sts x 44 rounds = 4 x 4 in / 10 x 10 cm stockinette stitch in the round pre-blocking 48 sts x 40 rounds = 4x4 in / 10 x 10 cm twisted ribbing in the round pre-blocking 1 https //www launchgood com/project/support_for_the_families__victims_of_the_new_zealand_mosque_shootings src=optinnzshootingrow&utm_source=optin&utm_medium=1&utm_campaign=nzshooting# /
